text: Cobra Starship was an American alternative dance band. The group started in 2005 in New York City. They are most famous for their songs "Snakes on a Plane (Bring It)" and "Good Girls Go Bad". They are currently signed to record label Fueled by Ramen. Cobra Starship officially dissolved on November 10, 2015. ==Band members== * Gabe Saporta - lead vocalist * Ryland Blackinton - guitarist * Alex Suarez - bassist * Nate Novarro - drummer * Victoria Asher - keytarist ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Year Album details Peak chart positions US US Indie US Heat CAN AUS NZ 2006 While the City Sleeps, We Rule the Streets * First studio album * Release date: October 10, 2006 * Label: Fueled by Ramen/Decaydance 125 7 1 — — — 2007 ¡Viva La Cobra! * Second studio album * Release date: October 23, 2007 * Label: Fueled by Ramen/Decaydance 80 19 — — — — 2009 Hot Mess * Third studio album * Release date: August 11, 2009 * Label: Fueled by Ramen/Decaydance 4 — — 14 51 18 "—" denotes releases that did not chart ===Singles=== Year Single Peak chart positionshttp://www.billboard.com/bbcom/esearch/chart_display.jsp?cfi=379&cfgn;=Singles&cfn;=The+Billboard+Hot+100&ci;=3108611&cdi;=10207852&cid;=05%2F30%2F2009 Album US US Pop US Alt.
